sentences.en: He send us a postdate cheque.
sentences.cn: 他寄给我们一张填迟日期的支票.

sentences.en: She let me postdate the cheque until the end of the month.
sentences.cn: 她让我将支票上的日期填为月底。

sentences.en: Some of the mosaics postdate this period.
sentences.cn: 这些镶嵌画中有些要晚于这段时期。

trans.tran_cn: 填迟…的日期 that is later than the actual date)
trans.tran_en: if you postdate a cheque, you write it with a date that is later than the actual date, so that it will not become effective until that time
